title: FPS HELP!!!
body: Hello, recently I have not been able to play league because my frames have been awful normally my frames are fine about 60-70 which was good for me but for the past couple of days my frames were about 3-5 so it was completely unplayable and I don't know what happened within the days in between because last week it was fine but now it's terrible. I don't know what to do so if anybody could help that would be great

replies.body:
Framerate problems are certainly frustrating and can be caused by a handful of factors. More often than not, they're a direct result of malfunctioning display drivers or problems with your windows power settings. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) will take you through the most common solutions, so I strongly recommend giving those steps a try.

Let me know if this caused any change in your framerate.
